episode_summary: This episode covers a variety of quirky and humorous topics, including unusual legal allowances in Utah, Victorian beach customs, the dietary changes of a comic character due to mad cow disease, and the discovery of ancient worm sperm.

facts.fact: In Utah, it is illegal to wear a hat in your driving license photo, but you can wear a colander.
There was a Victorian job that consisted solely of pushing people into the sea.
Desperate Dan stopped eating cow pie because of mad cow disease.
The oldest sperm is worm sperm.
